Package controller

Class HostController

java.lang.Object
controller.HostController
public class HostController
extends java.lang.Object
StartController only for the host menu. It lets the player choose the playing color and hosts the game on the local IPv4 address and port 50000

  • Constructor Details

    • HostController

      public HostController()

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initialize method, which sets a random background picture and places the buttons and labels on the correct spot. A web socket gets created and Google DNS (8.8.8.8) is getting pinged to find out the local IP address. Only one (image)button can be selected at the same moment.

    • mouseEnteredHandler

      public void mouseEnteredHandler​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Changes the background color of a button if you hover over it to highlight it, except when it is already selected.
      Parameters:
      e - onHover MouseEvent

    • mouseExitedHandler

      public void mouseExitedHandler​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent e)
      Changes the background color of a button if you stop hovering over it to unhighlight it, except when it is already selected.
      Parameters:
      e -
